import React, { Component } from "react"; class Form extends Component { constructor() { super(); this.state = { studentId: '', studentName: '', studentAge: '', studentGender: false, studentDateBirth: '', studentPlaceBirth: '', studentAddress: '', } } handleChange = (event) => { let name = event.target.name let value = event.target.value this.setState({ [name]: value }) console.log(name, value); } hideForm = () => { this.props.controlForm(false); } render() { let { listStudents } = this.props; let { selectedStudent } = this.props let { id } = this.props; let { actionName } = this.props let elementButton = '' if (actionName == "CreateStudent") { elementButton = } else if (actionName == "UpdateStudent") { elementButton = } return (
